title: How Smart Are You?
summary: Quickly take this quiz, if you dare, and find out!

questions.text: Is there a 4th of July in England?
questions.answerText: It comes after the third of July, just like every other month.

questions.text: How many birthdays does the average person have?
questions.answerText: Everyone was born on just one day. What people celebrate are the anniversaries of their birthdays.

questions.text: Some months have 31 days. How many have 28?
questions.answerText: All months have at least 28 days.

questions.text: How many outs are there in an inning of baseball?
Is it legal for a man in California to marry his widow's sister?
questions.answerText: The man must be dead because his wife is a widow. If the man was alive and the woman was dead, he would be called a widower instead.

questions.text: Divide 30 by ½ and add 10.  What is the answer?
questions.answerText: 30 divided by ½ is 60. Add 10 to get 70.

questions.text: If there are 3 apples and you take away 2, how many apples do you have?
questions.answerText: If you took 2, you have 2 apples.

questions.text: A doctor gives you three pills, telling you to take one pill every half hour.  How many minutes would the pills last?
questions.answerText: Start with the first pill. 30 minutes later you take the second. Another 30 minutes later and you would take the third.

questions.text: A farmer has 17 sheep, and all but 9 die.  How many are left?
questions.answerText: When all but 9 die, that means 9 are still alive.

questions.text: How many animals of each gender did Moses take on the ark?
questions.answerText: Moses didn't have an ark. Noah did.

questions.text: How many two cent stamps are there in a dozen?
questions.answerText: There are 12 or anything in a dozen.
